thread.title: Roslyn Eade
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Roslyn Eade

author: Roslyn Eade
title: Roslyn Eade
text: I base my decision on the fact that Finn Peacock was a good expert on solar panel and having a connection with CSIRO. All the information was there. I emailed Fin and asked his opinion of something listed on my Quote: whcih I didnt understand he replied back immediately with an explanation. Solar Quote: s suggested very good reputable providers to Quote: and install the solar panels. Took me a little while to wade through as I like to research and double check everything . I had MANY questions for the 3 Solar Companies involved. They responded to all my queries offering advise pleasantly. . Eventually I made my decision based on solar Quote: s recommendations. Have also recommended them to my friends. .
